text:
After upgrading to the latest release (2.2.6) of httpd, .htaccess files with 
names no longer work. No error is generated, and the files seem to work fine 
with IP addresses, just not DNS names. The error message records:

[Thu Nov 01 09:27:40 2007] [error] [client [IP deleted]] client denied by 
server configuration:

If the DNS name is switched to an IP address all works as expected. It appears 
that the DNS name is not causing a lookup and failing. Even if HostnameLookups 
are enabled globally it still seems to fail.
creator: wjs@cs.duke.edu

compiling all of the modules in. I have not figured out which interaction
